an5.60:4.1: “Mendicants, it’s hard to find someone gone forth when old who has five qualities.
an5.60:4.3: It’s hard to find someone gone forth when old who is easy to correct, retains what they learn, and learns respectfully, who can teach the Dharma and has memorized the Vinaya.
an5.60:4.4: It’s hard to find someone gone forth when old who has these five qualities.”
